description: A pair of improvised arm guards made from broken pieces of a two by four that are tied to your arms with rags and string.  They offer good protection, but are really uncomfortable to wear.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: Arm guards made of stacked paper sheets held together with duct tape.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A pair of arm guards made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A pair of soft neoprene arm sleeves.  Often used in contact sports.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
